author: Michael Slezak
title: These experimental 'biohackers' reckon they have the answer to COVID-19 test kit shortages
description: Amateur "biohackers" are making their own experimental COVID-19 test kits, which purport to diagnose the disease in just 30 minutes. Now they're hoping regulators will approve them for wider use.
content:
Posted 
March 25, 2020 06:08:10
Amateur "biohackers" are making their own experimental COVID-19 test kits, which purport to diagnose the disease in just 30 minutes, and which patients can potentially perform themselves.
